Mount360Micro.name: Micro 360 Turret Mount
Mount360Micro.desc: A cheaper lighter 360 mount that has only 66% of the range of mounted weapons.

Mount10Range.name: Spinal Turret Mount
Mount10Range.desc: A narrow angle forward mount that grants a large flat range bonus range.

Mount10Demi.name: Demispinal Turret Mount
Mount10Demi.desc: A smaller narrow angle forward mount that grants a moderate flat range bonus.

DroneBody.name: DroneBody
DroneBody.desc: An independent drone with the mounted weapon.

Pad2x2.name: Fighter pad
Pad2x2.desc: Allows fighters to land and repair.

HArmor2x2.desc: Adds HP but also adds a lot of weight, making a ship slower.

Reactor2x2.name: 2x2 Reactor
Reactor2x2.desc: Use this to power your ship. Reactors are heavy and expensive.

Reactor1x2.name: 1x2 Reactor
Reactor1x2.desc: Use this to power your ship. Reactors are heavy and expensive.

Reactor2x1.name: 2x1 Reactor
Reactor2x1.desc: Use this to power your ship. Reactors are heavy and expensive.

Reactor1x1.name: 1x1 Reactor
Reactor1x1.desc: Use this to power your ship. Reactors are heavy and expensive.

Solar1x1.name: 1x1 Solar Panel
Solar1x1.desc: Use this to power your ship. Solar panels are light but don't generate much energy.

Solar2x2.name: 2x2 Solar Panel
Solar2x2.desc: Use this to power your ship. Solar panels are light but don't generate much energy.

Solar3x3.name: 3x3 Solar Panel
Solar3x3.desc: Use this to power your ship. Solar panels are light but don't generate much energy.

EnergyTransfer.name: Energy Transfer
EnergyTransfer.desc: Gives energy to units in 800m range. Gives 960e per ship.

StasisField.name: Stasis Field
StasisField.desc: Slows and decloaks enemy ships. Drains 2% user's cloak/second.

SupercapitalBridge.name: Supercapital Bridge
SupercapitalBridge.desc: Extends a ships cost limit by $500.

ShieldGen2x2.name: Heavy Shield Generator
ShieldGen2x2.desc: A powerful shield generator that guzzles energy.

ShieldGen1x1.name: Shield Capacitor
ShieldGen1x1.desc: Allows stronger shields with limited regeneration assistance.

CloakGenerator.name: Cloak Generator
CloakGenerator.desc: Cloaks 66T/second while stationary. Keeps 165T cloaked while moving.

Battery1x2.name: Battery
Battery1x2.desc: Batteries store energy and come with a full charge to power your ship.

Battery1x1.name: Battery
Battery1x1.desc: Batteries store energy and come with a full charge to power your ship.

Battery2x1.name: Battery
Battery2x1.desc: Batteries store energy and come with a full charge to power your ship.

Battery2x2.name: Battery
Battery2x2.desc: Batteries store energy and come with a full charge to power your ship.

Engine05.name: Battleship Thruster
Engine05.desc: An ultra-heavy thruster to provide a minimum speed for the heaviest ships.

Engine09.name: Large Bulk Thruster
Engine09.desc: Low energy thruster for high mass. Rated for 0-150 m/s

Engine02.name: Bulk Thruster
Engine02.desc: Low energy thruster for high mass. Rated for 0-125 m/s

Engine01.name: Cruiser Thruster
Engine01.desc: Efficient thruster for medium ships. Rated for 100-350 m/s

Engine08.name: Compact Cruiser Thruster
Engine08.desc: Efficient thruster for medium ships. Rated for 100-350 m/s

Engine04.name: Scout Thruster
Engine04.desc: The smallest thruster available. Rated for 100-400 m/s

Engine043Long.name: Scout Thruster
Engine043Long.desc: The smallest thruster available. Rated for 100-400 m/s

Engine03.name: Fighter Thruster
Engine03.desc: A light thruster good for fast ships. Rated for 250+ m/s

Engine03Long.name: Fighter Thruster
Engine03Long.desc: A light thruster good for fast ships. Rated for 250+ m/s

Engine07.name: Interceptor Afterburner
Engine07.desc: A huge inefficient thruster. Burns a lot of energy to make ships move very fast.

JumpEngine.name: Jump Engine
JumpEngine.desc: Allows you to perform short jumps. Drains some energy and 2% cloak per second.

Wing2x2.name: Wing
Wing2x2.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

Wing1x2.name: Wing
Wing1x2.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

Wing2x1.name: Wing
Wing2x1.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

Wing1x1Angle.name: Wing
Wing1x1Angle.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

Wing1x1Round.name: Wing
Wing1x1Round.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

Wing1x1Notch.name: Wing
Wing1x1Notch.desc: Adds turn rate to your units, more wings make ships turn faster.

HeavyPDTurret.name: Heavy Point Defence Turret
HeavyPDTurret.desc: Point defence turret. Hits multiple projectiles. Counters missiles.

RamTurret.name: Kinetic Ram
RamTurret.desc: Knocks a target back with speed depending on its mass.

TorpTurret.name: Torpedo Launcher
TorpTurret.desc: Launches torpedos that move in straight line.

MissileTurret.name: Missile Launcher
MissileTurret.desc: Launches tracking missiles that chase targets.

ArtilleryTurret.name: Artillery Gun
ArtilleryTurret.desc: Launches a slow moving shell that explodes at the targeted area.

SidewinderTurret.name: Sidewinder Missile
SidewinderTurret.desc: Sidewinder is a slow moving tracking missile.

LightPlasmaTurret.name: Light Plasma Turret
LightPlasmaTurret.desc: Fires a moderate long range projectile.

FlackTurret.name: Heavy Flak
FlackTurret.desc: Anti-fighter weapon that explodes with AoE at the targeted area.

SniperGun.name: Sniper Gun
SniperGun.desc: Fires a sniper round with high DPS. Its only good at max range and requires massive banks. The sniper ship must not be moving, and it has 18% chance of firing in any one second.

EMPGun.name: EMP Gun
EMPGun.desc: Fires an EMP orb that drains energy from targets and deals low damage.

EMPGun2.name: Orb Launcher
EMPGun2.desc: Deploys an orb that launches out after a second, at high speed.

BombGun.name: Phase Bomb Launcher
BombGun.desc: Fires a powerful mid-range but easy to dodge projectile.

AutoTurret.name: Auto Cannon
AutoTurret.desc: Fires five bullets in rapid bursts.

Shotgun.name: Shotgun
Shotgun.desc: Fires five bullets in rapid bursts.

TeslaTurret.name: Tesla Turret
TeslaTurret.desc: Fires lighting bolts that arc between units.

WavePullTurret.name: Gravity Pull Wave
WavePullTurret.desc: Projects a gravity wave that pulls and damages as it passes through units.

WavePushTurret.name: Gravity Push Wave
WavePushTurret.desc: Projects a gravity wave that pushes and damages as it passes through units.

FlameTurret.name: Flamethrower
FlameTurret.desc: Fires a flame that lights units on fire that deals burn damage over time.

AOEWarhead.name: Explosive Warhead
AOEWarhead.desc: Kamikaze warhead dealing damage within an area

EMPWarhead.name: EMP Warhead
EMPWarhead.desc: Kamikaze EMP blast draining energy within an area

FlameWarhead.name: Flame Warhead
FlameWarhead.desc: Kamikaze flame blast applying burn damage within an area

ShapedWarhead.name: Shaped Warhead
ShapedWarhead.desc: Explodes on impact dealing instant damage

TargetingMod.name: Targeting Subsystem
TargetingMod.desc: Increaces range of adjacent weapons at cost of reload rate. -15% effect for each supported weapon.

DamageMod.name: Overcharger
DamageMod.desc: Increases damage of adjacent weapons at cost of reload rate. -15% effect for each supported weapon

ReloaderMod.name: Reloader
ReloaderMod.desc: Decreases reload time of adjacent weapons. -15% effect for each supported weapon

BulletSpeedMod.name: Speed Coils
BulletSpeedMod.desc: Adds flat range and flat % bullet speed to adjacent weapons at cost of reload rate. -15% effect for each supported weapon.

DampenerMod.name: Dampener
DampenerMod.desc: Decreases energy usage of adjacent weapons at the cost of bullet speed. -15% effect for each supported weapon.

Ai1.name: Missile Only AI
Ai1.desc: Makes the adjacent turrets shoot only at missiles if close to missile ships. (does not work yet)

OverKillAi.name: No Overkill
OverKillAi.desc: Makes the adjacent turrets not shoot if it would kill an enemy twice in one shot.

Ai3.name: Accurate AI
Ai3.desc: Makes the adjacent turrets shoot only at targets is sure really to hit. (does not work yet)

Ai4.name: AOE AI
Ai4.desc: Makes the adjacent turrets shoot in the middle of groups trying to hit it with AOE damage. (does not work yet)
